title: Drinks Menu
description: Real ales, premium spirits, and extensive drinks selection at The Anchor

items.name: Birra Moretti
items.description: 4.6% ABV - Italy's premium lager since 1859. A perfectly balanced beer with a delicate hop aroma and smooth, refreshing finish. Pairs beautifully with our stone-baked pizzas.

items.name: Carling
items.description: 4.0% ABV - Britain's favourite session lager. Light, crisp and refreshing with a clean finish. The perfect pint for watching the match or catching up with friends.

items.name: Stella Artois
items.description: 4.6% ABV - Belgium's finest export lager. Reassuringly expensive taste with distinctive hoppy bitterness and citrus notes. Brewed to perfection since 1366.

items.name: Fosters
items.description: 3.7% ABV - Australia's gift to British pubs. Easy-drinking lager with a light malt character and subtle sweetness. Ideal for long summer afternoons in our beer garden.

items.name: Pravha
items.description: 4.0% ABV - Czech-style pilsner brewed with Saaz hops. Golden colour with a delicate floral aroma and crisp, clean taste. A sophisticated choice for lager lovers.

items.name: Carlsberg
items.description: 3.8% ABV - Probably the best beer in the world? Danish pilsner with a light, refreshing taste and smooth hoppy notes. A classic that never goes out of style.

items.name: Guinness
items.description: 4.1% ABV - Ireland's iconic stout. Rich, creamy head with deep roasted barley flavours, hints of coffee and chocolate. Good things come to those who wait for the perfect pour.

items.name: Aspall
items.description: 5.5% ABV - Suffolk's finest cider since 1728. Medium dry with a crisp apple finish. Made from a secret blend of culinary and cider apples from their own orchards.

items.name: Inch's Medium Apple Cider
items.description: 4.5% ABV - Traditional West Country cider with a perfect balance of sweetness and sharp apple flavours. Refreshingly smooth with a clean, fruity finish.

items.name: Abbot Ale
items.description: 5.0% ABV - Premium English ale from Greene King. Full-bodied with a distinctive fruity aroma and malty richness. Brewed in Bury St Edmunds since 1086.

items.name: Greene King IPA
items.description: 3.6% ABV - A perfectly balanced India Pale Ale with fresh hop flavours and citrus notes. Light amber colour with a clean, refreshing bitter finish.

items.name: Old Speckled Hen
items.description: 5.0% ABV - Distinctive tawny coloured ale with a superb malty taste. Smooth, creamy and full-flavoured with a refreshing bitterness. A true British classic.

items.name: Newcastle Brown Ale
items.description: 4.7% ABV - The one and only Newkie Brown. Sweet caramel notes balanced with moderate bitterness. An icon of the North East since 1927.

items.name: Budweiser
items.description: 5.0% ABV - The King of Beers. American lager aged on beechwood chips for smoothness. Crisp, clean and refreshing with subtle hop aroma.

items.name: Corona Extra
items.description: 4.5% ABV - Mexico's favourite beer. Light, refreshing pilsner-style lager best served with a wedge of lime. Transport yourself to a beach in Cancun.

items.name: Desperados
items.description: 5.9% ABV - Tequila-flavoured beer that breaks all the rules. A unique blend of lager with a hint of tequila for those who like to live on the edge.

items.name: Peroni Nastro Azzurro
items.description: 5.1% ABV - Italy's number one premium lager. Crisp and refreshing with a delicate balance of bitterness and citrus aromatic notes. La dolce vita in a bottle.

items.name: Peroni 0%
items.description: 0.0% ABV - All the Italian style without the alcohol. Same crisp, refreshing taste of Peroni with citrus notes. A refreshing alcohol-free option.

items.name: Magners Original
items.description: 4.5% ABV - Ireland's original premium cider. Made from 17 varieties of apples for a unique crisp taste. Best served over ice for ultimate refreshment.

items.name: Old Mout Berries & Cherries
items.description: 4.0% ABV - New Zealand fruit cider bursting with strawberry and raspberry flavours, finished with sweet cherries. A fruity adventure in every bottle.

items.name: Old Mout Kiwi & Lime
items.description: 4.0% ABV - Tropical fusion of tangy kiwi and zesty lime. Light, refreshing and packed with exotic fruit flavours from the land of the long white cloud.

items.name: Old Mout Strawberry & Apple
items.description: 4.0% ABV - Sweet strawberries blended with crisp apples. A summery cider that's like drinking sunshine. Perfect for our beer garden.

items.name: Aspall Premier Cru
items.description: 7.0% ABV - Champagne of ciders. Elegant, sparkling cider with fine bubbles and complex apple flavours. A sophisticated choice for special occasions.

sections.title: Featured Cocktails
sections.description: NEW! Our mixologist's special creations using premium mixers. Limited time only!

items.name: Pink Paloma
items.description: A vibrant twist on the Mexican classic. Vodka meets zesty pink grapefruit for a refreshingly bitter-sweet sensation. Perfect for those who like their cocktails with attitude.

items.name: English Garden
items.description: Quintessentially British elegance in a glass. Premium gin infused with delicate elderflower creates a sophisticated summer sipper. Beautifully balanced and utterly refreshing.

items.name: Tropical Punch
items.description: Caribbean vibes meet tropical paradise. Spiced rum dancing with exotic fruit flavours. One sip and you'll be planning your next beach holiday.

items.name: Apricot Fizz
items.description: Effervescent elegance with a fruity twist. Vodka mingles with apricot and grape notes, topped with sparkle. Light, bright and dangerously easy to drink.

items.name: Moscow Mule
items.description: The copper mug classic reimagined. Premium vodka kicks it with fiery ginger beer. Bold, spicy and refreshingly different.

items.name: Dark & Stormy
items.description: Bermuda's gift to stormy nights. Dark spiced rum battles premium ginger beer in this tempestuous classic. Not for the faint-hearted.

items.name: Whiskey Ginger
items.description: Smooth Irish whiskey meets sophisticated ginger ale. A refined twist on the highball that's both warming and refreshing.

items.name: Cuba Libre
items.description: The rebel's rum and coke. Spiced rum elevated with artisan cola creates a premium take on the Cuban classic. Viva la revoluci√≥n!

items.name: Espresso Martini
items.description: The ultimate pick-me-up. Rich coffee meets smooth spirits in this sophisticated cocktail that's perfect for starting or ending your night. Guaranteed to get you buzzing.

items.name: Passion Fruit Martini
items.description: Tropical paradise in a glass. Sweet, tangy and utterly irresistible, served with a cheeky shot of fizz on the side. Our most Instagrammable cocktail.

items.name: Classic Margarita
items.description: Mexico's gift to the world. Perfectly balanced sweet and sour with a salt-rimmed glass. One sip and you'll be planning your next holiday.

items.name: Vodka Margarita
items.description: Our rebellious twist on the classic. All the lime-kissed goodness with a different kind of kick. For those who like to break the rules.

items.name: Aperol Spritz
items.description: Sunset in Venice captured in a glass. Bittersweet, bubbly and refreshing. The perfect aperitif for those long summer evenings.

items.name: Mojito
items.description: Cuba's refreshing gift to the world. Fresh mint, lime and rum muddled to perfection. Summer in a glass.

items.name: Peach Blush
items.description: Holiday romance in liquid form. Fruity, fun and flirty with sunset colours that'll transport you to tropical shores. No SPF required.

items.name: Woo Woo
items.description: The cheeky cousin of the Cosmo. Pretty in pink with a perfect balance of sweet and tart. Guaranteed to get the party started.

items.name: Pimm's
items.description: Summer in the English countryside. Refreshing blend with fresh fruit, cucumber and mint. Perfect for sharing in our sunny beer garden.

items.name: Apple & Blackberry Pie
items.description: Autumn comfort in cocktail form. Like your nan's best dessert but with a naughty twist. Warming spices meet orchard fruits.

items.name: Captain's Colada
items.description: Christmas meets the Caribbean. Our festive take on the tropical classic. Santa's favourite way to unwind after a long night.

items.name: Hot Toddy
items.description: The ultimate winter warmer. Soothing blend of warming spices and citrus. Like a hug in a mug for cold evenings.

items.name: Baby Guinness
items.description: Looks like the real thing but sweeter. A layered shot that's almost too pretty to drink. Almost.

items.name: Jager Bomb
items.description: The party starter. Drop it, down it, feel the energy surge. Not for the faint-hearted.

items.name: Kick Bomb
items.description: Our secret weapon for late-night stamina. When you need that extra boost to keep the good times rolling.

items.name: Skittle Bomb
items.description: Taste the rainbow! Sweet and fruity shot that's like liquid candy. A colorful explosion of flavor.

categories.title: Spirits
categories.description: Our extensive collection of premium spirits, carefully curated for every taste

sections.title: Manager's Special - September
sections.description: 25% OFF Redleg Spiced Rum throughout September!

items.name: Redleg Spiced Rum
items.description: Caribbean warmth in a glass. Redleg Spiced Rum brings notes of vanilla, ginger and exotic spices to chase away the autumn chill. Enjoy 25% off all serves this month! Doubles available at bar prices.

items.name: Bombay Sapphire
items.description: The world's number one premium gin. Ten exotic botanicals create a perfectly balanced, bright and fresh taste.

items.name: Hendrick's
items.description: Delightfully peculiar gin infused with cucumber and rose. Refreshingly unusual and perfect with cucumber garnish.

items.name: Hendrick's Flora Adora
items.description: A floral symphony from Hendrick's. Blooming with herbal and floral notes for a garden party in a glass.

items.name: Tanqueray London Dry
items.description: Four botanicals perfected over 180 years. The bartender's choice for the perfect G&T.

items.name: Tanqueray Flor de Sevilla
items.description: Seville orange meets classic Tanqueray. Zesty, bittersweet and perfect with tonic.

items.name: Tanqueray 10
items.description: Ultra-premium gin with fresh citrus fruits. The pinnacle of Tanqueray craftsmanship.

items.name: Tanqueray Blackcurrant Royale
items.description: French blackcurrants meet British gin. Rich, fruity and luxuriously smooth.

items.name: Gordon's
items.description: The world's best-selling London Dry Gin. Triple-distilled with juniper berries and secret botanicals.

items.name: Gordon's Pink
items.description: The original pink gin. Sweet strawberry and raspberry notes balanced with Gordon's classic juniper.

items.name: Gordon's White Peach
items.description: Juicy white peach meets classic Gordon's. Summer sophistication in every sip.

items.name: Gordon's Lemon
items.description: Zesty Sicilian lemons enhance Gordon's gin. Bright, citrusy and refreshing.

items.name: Gordon's Tropical Passionfruit
items.description: Exotic passionfruit brings tropical vibes. Sweet, tangy and perfect for summer.

items.name: Gordon's Sloe Gin
items.description: Traditional sloe berries steeped in Gordon's gin. Sweet, fruity and warming.

items.name: Whitley Neill Rhubarb & Ginger
items.description: Yorkshire rhubarb meets warming ginger. A taste of the English countryside with a spicy twist.

items.name: Kopparberg Strawberry & Lime Gin
items.description: Swedish innovation meets British tradition. Fresh strawberries and zesty lime create summer magic.

items.name: Chase Sloe Gin
items.description: Herefordshire sloes meet Chase's potato vodka base. Premium, smooth and deliciously different.

items.name: Williams Chase Pink Grapefruit Gin
items.description: Zesty pink grapefruit from Chase. Crisp, citrusy and wonderfully refreshing.

items.name: Warner's Elderflower Gin
items.description: Farm-grown elderflowers create floral magic. Delicate, aromatic and quintessentially English.

items.name: Warner's Honeybee Gin
items.description: Local honey adds golden sweetness. Smooth, mellow and bee-autifully balanced.

items.name: The Botanist
items.description: 22 hand-foraged botanicals from Islay. Complex, refined and utterly unique.

items.name: Pimm's No. 1
items.description: The original summer cup. Gin-based liqueur with herbs and citrus. Essential for British summers.

items.name: Jameson
items.description: Triple-distilled Irish smoothness. The world's best-selling Irish whiskey with notes of vanilla and toasted wood.

items.name: Jack Daniel's
items.description: Tennessee's finest. Charcoal mellowed drop by drop for exceptional smoothness. Old No. 7 never goes out of style.

items.name: Jack Daniel's Honey
items.description: Tennessee whiskey meets golden honey. Sweet, smooth and dangerously drinkable.

items.name: Jack Daniel's Fire
items.description: Cinnamon heat meets Jack Daniel's smoothness. Fiery finish with a warm embrace.

items.name: Jack Daniel's Apple
items.description: Crisp green apple meets Tennessee whiskey. Fresh, fruity and surprisingly smooth.

items.name: Glenfiddich 12
items.description: The world's most awarded single malt. Fresh pear and subtle oak flavours from Scotland's valley of the deer.

items.name: Glenmorangie
items.description: Highland single malt aged in bourbon casks. Creamy, fruity and delicately complex.

items.name: Monkey Shoulder
items.description: Triple malt for mixing or sipping. Smooth, rich and mellow with vanilla and spice notes.

items.name: Maker's Mark
items.description: Kentucky bourbon sealed with red wax. Sweet with caramel and vanilla notes. Handcrafted in small batches.

items.name: Talisker 10
items.description: From the Isle of Skye. Powerful peat smoke with sea-salt and sweet notes. A taste of the Scottish coast.

items.name: Johnnie Walker Black Label
items.description: 12-year-old blended Scotch. Deep, complex flavour with smoky notes. The icon walks on.

items.name: Famous Grouse
items.description: Scotland's favourite blended whisky. Smooth, balanced and perfect for mixing.

items.name: Bell's
items.description: Classic blended Scotch since 1825. Smoky, nutty and distinctively smooth.

items.name: Bushmills
items.description: Ireland's oldest whiskey from 1608. Light, fruity and exceptionally smooth.

items.name: Southern Comfort
items.description: New Orleans original since 1874. Whiskey liqueur with fruit and spice notes.

items.name: Shanky's Whip
items.description: Irish whiskey meets vanilla liqueur. Smooth, creamy and dangerously moreish.

items.name: Bailey's Irish Cream
items.description: The original Irish cream liqueur. Luxuriously creamy with chocolate and vanilla notes. Perfect over ice or in coffee.

items.name: Grey Goose
items.description: French luxury vodka. Exceptionally smooth with subtle notes of almond. The world's best tasting vodka.

items.name: Grey Goose Strawberry & Lemongrass
items.description: Premium vodka meets exotic flavours. Fresh strawberries enhanced with aromatic lemongrass.

items.name: Smirnoff Red
items.description: Triple distilled and ten times filtered. The world's number one vodka. Pure, clean and versatile.

items.name: Smirnoff Raspberry Crush
items.description: Summer berries meet premium vodka. Sweet and fruity without being sickly. Perfect with lemonade.

items.name: Smirnoff Miami Peach
items.description: Sun-kissed peaches bring Miami vibes. Sweet, smooth and perfect for summer cocktails.

items.name: Smirnoff Mango & Passionfruit
items.description: Tropical explosion in a bottle. Exotic fruits create vacation vibes year-round.

items.name: Lustre Caffe Latte Cream with Vodka
items.description: Coffee cream liqueur meets vodka. Indulgent, smooth and perfect for dessert drinks.

items.name: Kraken Black Spiced
items.description: The beast from the deep. Rich, dark and mysterious with notes of cinnamon and vanilla. As smooth as the seven seas.

items.name: Captain Morgan Spiced
items.description: The Captain's legendary blend. Caribbean rum with warming spices. Perfect with cola and a squeeze of lime.

items.name: Captain Morgan's Dark
items.description: Rich, full-bodied dark rum. Molasses and caramel notes create depth and character.

items.name: Captain Morgan's Sliced Apple
items.description: Crisp apple meets spiced rum. Fresh, fruity and perfect for autumn nights.

items.name: Captain Morgan's Tiki
items.description: Tropical pineapple and mango flavours. Paradise in a bottle from the Captain.

items.name: Havana Club 3
items.description: Cuban tradition in every drop. Light, fresh and perfect for mojitos.

items.name: Havana Club Especial
items.description: Golden Cuban rum aged to perfection. Smooth, mellow and authentically Cuban.

items.name: Havana Club 7
items.description: Premium aged Cuban rum. Complex, sophisticated and perfect neat or on the rocks.

items.name: Bacardi
items.description: The world's most awarded rum. Light, crisp and the essential cocktail base.

items.name: Bacardi Carta Negra
items.description: Dark rum aged in charred oak. Rich, smooth with notes of tropical fruit.

items.name: Bacardi Coconut
items.description: Caribbean coconut meets Bacardi. Sweet, tropical and perfect for pi√±a coladas.

items.name: Malibu
items.description: Caribbean rum with coconut. Sweet, smooth and sunshine in a bottle.

items.name: Bambu Rum
items.description: Premium spiced rum with exotic flavours. Smooth, complex and distinctively different.

items.name: Redleg Spiced
items.description: Caribbean spiced rum with vanilla and ginger. Smooth, warming and perfectly balanced.

items.name: Redleg Pineapple
items.description: Tropical pineapple meets spiced rum. Sweet, juicy and irresistibly refreshing.

items.name: Redleg Banana
items.description: Ripe banana flavours enhance spiced rum. Creamy, sweet and tropically smooth.

items.name: Redleg Tropical
items.description: Exotic fruit medley meets Caribbean rum. Your tropical escape in a glass.

items.name: Trash & Treasure Banana
items.description: Artisan banana rum with authentic flavour. Smooth, rich and beautifully crafted.

items.name: Jose Cuervo Gold
items.description: The world's number one tequila. Smooth and sweet with notes of vanilla and caramel. Essential for margaritas.

items.name: Jose Cuervo Silver
items.description: Pure, unaged tequila. Crisp, clean with fresh agave flavours. Perfect for cocktails.

items.name: Patron Silver
items.description: Ultra-premium tequila. Crystal clear with fresh agave and citrus notes. Simply perfection.

items.name: Olmeca Altos Plata
items.description: 100% blue agave tequila. Herbal and citrus notes with a smooth finish.

items.name: Olmeca Reposado
items.description: Aged tequila with honey and vanilla notes. Smooth, mellow and perfect for sipping.

items.name: Cazcabel Coffee Tequila
items.description: Coffee meets tequila in perfect harmony. Rich, smooth with chocolate notes.

items.name: Vida Mezcal
items.description: Artisanal mezcal with smoky character. Complex, traditional and authentically Mexican.

items.name: Lustre Strawberry Cream with Tequila
items.description: Strawberries and cream meet tequila. Sweet, indulgent and surprisingly smooth.

items.name: Lustre Pineapple Cream with Rum
items.description: Tropical pineapple cream liqueur. Creamy, fruity and perfect for dessert cocktails.

items.name: Disaronno
items.description: Italian amaretto since 1525. Sweet almond flavours with a hint of cherry. Sophisticated and smooth.

items.name: Cointreau
items.description: Premium orange liqueur from France. Essential for cocktails or enjoyed neat over ice.

items.name: Chambord
items.description: Black raspberry liqueur fit for royalty. Rich, luxurious and presented in an orb-shaped bottle.

items.name: Kahlua
items.description: Mexican coffee liqueur. Rich arabica coffee with vanilla and caramel notes.

items.name: Tia Maria
items.description: Jamaican coffee liqueur with rum. Smooth, sweet with a coffee kick.

items.name: Drambuie
items.description: Scottish liqueur with whisky, honey and herbs. The Prince's dram since 1745.

items.name: Archers
items.description: Peach schnapps liqueur. Sweet, fruity and perfect for cocktails.

items.name: Midori
items.description: Japanese melon liqueur. Bright green, sweet and refreshingly different.

items.name: Aperol
items.description: Italian aperitif since 1919. Bittersweet orange with herbs. Essential for spritzes.

items.name: Pernod
items.description: French anise spirit. Complex herbs create the classic pastis flavour.

items.name: Courvoisier VS
items.description: French cognac with notes of fresh oak and spring flowers. Smooth and elegant.

items.name: Taylor's Fine Ruby Port
items.description: Full-bodied ruby port with rich berry flavours. Perfect after dinner.

items.name: Harvey's Bristol Cream Sherry
items.description: Classic cream sherry. Sweet, smooth with notes of caramel and dried fruit.

items.name: Martini Rosso
items.description: Sweet Italian vermouth with herbs and spices. Essential for Negronis and Manhattans.

items.name: Martini Extra Dry
items.description: Crisp, dry vermouth with floral notes. The classic martini ingredient.

items.name: J√§germeister
items.description: German herbal liqueur with 56 botanicals. Best served ice-cold.

items.name: Sambuca Classic
items.description: Italian anise-flavoured liqueur. Sweet and smooth, traditionally served with coffee beans.

items.name: Sambuca Raspberry
items.description: Fruity twist on the classic. Sweet raspberry meets traditional anise.

items.name: Sambuca Liquorice
items.description: Black sambuca with intense liquorice flavour. Bold and distinctive.

items.name: Sambuca Chilli
items.description: Fiery sambuca with a spicy kick. Not for the faint-hearted!

items.name: Sourz Apple
items.description: Bright green apple shooter. Sweet, sour and seriously fun.

items.name: Sourz Cherry
items.description: Bold cherry flavour shot. Sweet and tangy party favourite.

items.name: Sourz Strawberry
items.description: Summer strawberry sweetness. Fruity shot that goes down easy.

items.name: Counterpoint Shiraz
items.description: Australia - Full-bodied with rich plum and blackberry flavours, hints of black pepper and smooth tannins. Perfect with our steaks and burgers.

items.name: El Pico Cabernet Sauvignon
items.description: Chile - Classic Cabernet with blackcurrant and cedar notes. Medium-bodied with soft tannins. Excellent with our Sunday roasts.

items.name: I Heart Merlot
items.description: Italy - Soft and approachable with ripe cherry and plum flavours. Velvety smooth finish. Great with pasta and pizza.

items.name: I Heart Shiraz
items.description: Australia - Bold and spicy with dark fruit flavours. Peppery finish and medium tannins.

items.name: Rocosa Malbec
items.description: Argentina - Bold and fruity with dark berry flavours, violet notes and a hint of spice. Pairs beautifully with our beef dishes.

items.name: Gentlemen's Collection
items.description: France - Premium blend showcasing the best of French winemaking. Complex, elegant and perfect for special occasions.

items.name: Counterpoint Chardonnay
items.description: Australia - Tropical fruit flavours with subtle oak and creamy texture. Rich and full-bodied. Lovely with fish and chicken dishes.

items.name: El Pico Sauvignon Blanc
items.description: Chile - Zesty and refreshing with citrus and green apple notes. Crisp acidity makes it perfect with seafood.

items.name: Giotto Pinot Grigio
items.description: Italy - Light and crisp with delicate pear and citrus flavours. Easy-drinking and food-friendly.

items.name: I Heart Sauvignon Blanc
items.description: New Zealand - Vibrant tropical fruits and herbaceous notes. Refreshingly crisp with a zingy finish.

items.name: I Heart Pinot Grigio
items.description: Italy - Fresh and zesty with green apple and citrus notes. Light and refreshing.

items.name: I Heart Chardonnay
items.description: Australia - Ripe peach and melon flavours with a touch of vanilla. Smooth and well-balanced.

items.name: Piesporter Michelsberg
items.description: Germany - Delicate Riesling with floral aromas and hints of peach. Off-dry style perfect as an aperitif.

items.name: Montford Estate Sauvignon Blanc
items.description: New Zealand - Premium estate wine with intense citrus and passion fruit. Crisp, elegant and refreshing.

items.name: Gris des Seigneurs
items.description: France - Provence-style ros√©. Pale pink with delicate strawberry and citrus notes. Dry and refreshing.

items.name: I Heart Ros√©
items.description: Italy - Bright and fruity with summer berry flavours. Perfect for sunny afternoons in our beer garden.

items.name: Three Pebbles Bay
items.description: South Africa - Coral pink with red fruit aromas. Well-balanced with a crisp, dry finish.

items.name: Ara Pinot Gris
items.description: New Zealand - Copper-tinged ros√© style Pinot Gris. Aromatic with stone fruit flavours.

items.name: Ara Marlborough Sauvignon Ros√©
items.description: New Zealand - Elegant ros√© with wild strawberry and rose petal notes. Beautifully balanced.

items.name: Giorgio & Gianni Prosecco
items.description: Italy - Fine bubbles with apple and pear flavours. Light, fresh and perfect for celebrations or Sunday brunch.

items.name: Mulled Wine
items.description: Our secret recipe of red wine gently warmed with cinnamon, cloves and orange. Christmas in a glass.

categories.title: Soft Drinks & Mixers
categories.description: Refreshing non-alcoholic options and premium mixers for every occasion

items.name: Coca-Cola Range
items.description: The classics you love - Original, Diet Coke, and Coke Zero. Served ice-cold in glass bottles or on draught.

items.name: Lemonade & 7-Up Free
items.description: Crisp, refreshing lemon-lime sodas. Perfect on their own or as mixers for your favourite spirits.

items.name: J2O Fruit Fusions
items.description: Premium fruit blends: Orange & Passionfruit, Apple & Mango, Apple & Raspberry. The sophisticated soft drink choice.

items.name: Fanta Orange
items.description: Vibrant orange flavour served chilled. Fruity refreshment in every sip.

items.name: Appletiser
items.description: Sparkling apple juice. Sophisticated and refreshing alternative to alcoholic drinks.

items.name: Fresh Fruit Juices
items.description: Orange, Apple, Pineapple, and Cranberry juices. Perfect for mocktails or enjoyed on their own over ice.

items.name: Classic Mixers
items.description: Tonic, Slimline Tonic, Ginger Ale, and Soda Water. Essential companions for our premium spirits.

items.name: Schweppes Premium Sodas
items.description: Pink Grapefruit and Tropical sodas. Exotic flavours for adventurous mixologists.

items.name: Russchian Pink Soda
items.description: Unique pink soda with a twist. Perfect mixer for creative cocktails.

items.name: Cordials
items.description: Lime and Blackcurrant cordials. Classic mixers for a splash of flavour.

items.name: Fever-Tree Mexican Lime
items.description: Tahitian lime with Mexican lime oils. The perfect partner for premium vodka.

items.name: Fever-Tree Rhubarb & Raspberry
items.description: Tart rhubarb meets sweet raspberry. Artisan mixer for discerning gin lovers.

items.name: Fever-Tree Ginger Beer
items.description: Fiery ginger with natural sweetness. Essential for Moscow Mules and Dark & Stormys.

items.name: Fever-Tree Ginger Ale
items.description: Subtle ginger with refreshing sparkle. Perfect for whisky highballs.

items.name: Fever-Tree Madagascan Cola
items.description: Premium cola with real kola nut. Elevates any rum serve.

items.name: Fever-Tree White Grape & Apricot
items.description: Delicate fruit flavours create a sophisticated soda. Perfect with vodka or gin.

items.name: Fever-Tree Soda Water
items.description: Soft spring water with gentle carbonation. The purest mixer for premium spirits.

items.name: Fever-Tree Elderflower
items.description: Delicate elderflower with subtle sweetness. Quintessentially English mixer.

items.name: Red Bull
items.description: The original energy drink. Perfect pick-me-up for long nights or early airport runs.

items.name: Kick Energy
items.description: British-made energy boost with a refreshing citrus kick. Great value alternative.

items.name: Harrogate Spring Water
items.description: Still or Sparkling. Yorkshire's finest mineral water, naturally pure and refreshing.

items.name: Kids' Favourites
items.description: Fruit Shoot in Orange and Blackcurrant. Perfect size for little hands, no spills guaranteed!

responsibleDrinking.title: Please Drink Responsibly
responsibleDrinking.message: We want all our guests to enjoy their visit safely. Our trained staff are here to help ensure everyone has a great time. Please ask about our selection of low and no-alcohol alternatives.
